# code chef - rescue - dce04.py

t = int(raw_input())

for it in range(t):
    n, men, women, children = map(int, raw_input().split())
    women = min(women, 2*men)
    children = min(children, 4*(men+women))

    rescueChildren = min(n*4/5,children, (men+women)*4)
    rescueWomen = min(women, (n-rescueChildren)*2/3) 
    rescueMen = min(men,n-rescueWomen-rescueChildren)
    
##            if rescueWomen > 2*rescueMen:
##                continue
##            if rescueChildren > 4*(rescueMen + rescueWomen):
##                continue
    print rescueMen, rescueWomen, rescueChildren
